title: Despite all the critics, California could soon rise to the world's 4th-largest economy
dc:creator: Grace Toohey
description: Forecasts show California could soon surpass Germany in GDP, a measure that reflects the state's growth and resiliency, but also Germany's economic struggles.
content:encoded: Forecasts show California could soon surpass Germany in GDP, a measure that reflects the state's growth and resiliency, but also Germany's economic struggles.

media:content.media:description: Facade with logo at the Googleplex, headquarters of Google Inc in the Silicon Valley, Mountain View, California, April 13, 2019. (Photo by Smith Collection/Gado/Getty Images)
